org.gbif.common.search.builder

Class SolrQueryBuilder<T,P extends Enum<?> & org.gbif.api.model.common.search.SearchParameter>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.common.search.builder.SolrQueryBuilder<T,P>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - is the type of the annotated class that holds the mapping information.
    P - is the SearchParameter Enum type used for enumerate the supported facets / search parameter.

    public class SolrQueryBuilder<T,P extends Enum<?> & org.gbif.api.model.common.search.SearchParameter>
extends Object
    Builder class that helps in the creation process of SolrQuery objects from SearchRequest objects. The build method is not thread safe, supports the cloneable interface for allowing holds a partial state, that can be cloned and repeated in other instances.

      • withRequestHandler

        public SolrQueryBuilder<T,P> withRequestHandler(String requestHandler)
